response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth and provides you with a remarkable chance to own something truly special. I trust this offer will resonate with your appreciation for quality and exclusivity. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know without delay. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your life.", "product_price": 900000}
